markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Subsist](/Rules.aspx?ID=569)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 506 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A simple DC is usually sufficient for the Subsist action, with a trained DC for a typical situation. Use the disposition of the environment or city as a guide; an environment with scarce resources or a city with little tolerance for transience might require an expert or higher DC.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Subsist

text: Subsist Source Core Rulebook pg. 506 4.0 A simple DC is usually sufficient for the Subsist action, with a trained DC for a typical situation. Use the disposition of the environment or city as a guide; an environment with scarce resources or a city with little tolerance for transience might require an expert or higher DC.
